dmca.title: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [67.15.97.14 [...] www.brand-electron
dmca.body:
________________________________

From: Barbara Davis [mailto:bdavis@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2007 1:04 PM
To: DMCA Houston
Subject: Abuse complaint regarding the server located at [67.15.97.14
[...] www.brand-electronics.com /LG

 

EV1Servers.net,

 

Thank you for you attention to this matter.  I have rechecked
www.brand-electronics.com <http://www.brand-electronics.com/>  and found
they are still in violation of LG's trademark.  I have pasted all
infringing URL's below to better assist in reaching compliance.  Please
notify me at Bdavis@netenforcers.com once all changes have been made so
I can close the case.

 

http://www.brand-electronics.com/products/?product=25015

http://www.brand-electronics.com/products/?product=25010

http://www.brand-electronics.com/products/?product=37506

http://www.brand-electronics.com/products/?product=37508

http://www.brand-electronics.com/products/?product=25011

 

Thank you,

 

Barbara Davis

LMS Manager

Net Enforcers Inc.

BDavis@netenforcers.com 
compliance.management@netenforcers.com 

 

The Online Enforcement Specialists......

Statement of Confidentiality
The contents of this e-mail message and any attachments are confidential
and are intended solely for the addressee.  The information may also be
legally privileged.  This transmission is sent in trust, for the sole
purpose of delivery to the intended recipient.  If you have received
this transmission in error, any use, reproduction or dissemination of
this transmission is strictly prohibited.  If you are not the intended
recipient, please immediately notify the sender by reply e-mail and
delete this message and its attachments, if any. Thank you.

 

 

 

-----Original Message-----
From: Compliance Management
[mailto:compliance.management@netenforcers.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, April 24, 2007 7:55 AM
To: Barbara Davis
Subject: Re: [Ticket#2007042310000696] Abuse complaint regarding the
server located at [67.15.97.14 [...]

 

 

Your Ticket-Team

 

 -

 Barbara Davis
